Articles.Content:
Just installed the mod Canadarm and all the mods that are needed to let it work(infernal robotics) but after many tries it didn't work in KSP 1.4.5. I tried different mods for a robotic arm but none of them worked.

I can't make mods so could someone please make a mod for 1.4.5 with a robotic arm?
Moved from KSP Discussion to Add-on Discussion.
